name: Tiramisu
description: Mascarpone cheese and lady fingers soaked in rum and coffee topped with chocolate shavings.
serverNotes: Classic Italian tiramisu with espresso-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone. Rich, creamy, coffee-forward. Pairs beautifully with dessert wines (Vin Santo, Moscato d'Asti), Port, or espresso martinis. Also great with coffee or cappuccino.

name: Pistachio Crème Brulé
description: Pistachio-infused custard, crisp caramelized sugar crust, and pistachio brittle
serverNotes: Elegant pistachio crème brûlée with caramelized sugar crust. Nutty, creamy, sophisticated. Pairs wonderfully with dessert wines (late harvest Riesling, Sauternes), Port, or sweet sparkling wines. Premium dessert choice.

name: Affogato
description: An Italian classic, two scoops of vanilla gelato, a hazelnut and chocolate stuffed pirouline cookie, biscotti crumble and hot espresso.
serverNotes: Classic Italian dessert - vanilla gelato 'drowned' in hot espresso with hazelnut cookie, biscotti. Coffee and ice cream perfection. Pairs with additional espresso, or enhance with amaretto, Frangelico, or sambuca. Traditional Italian finish. Contains nuts.

name: Espresso Brownie Sundae
description: Two housemade brownies enriched with espresso powder, chocolate chips, and espresso frosting. Served with a scoop of gelato, chocolate sauce, and whipped cream.
serverNotes: Decadent brownie sundae with espresso-infused brownie, gelato, whipped cream, chocolate. Rich, indulgent. Pairs with dessert wines (Port, Banyuls), coffee cocktails, or stout beers. Chocolate lover's dream.

name: VIA's Crêpe Cake
description: 15 housemade crêpes layered with a cream cheese and mascarpone filling. Drizzled with a chocolate ganache and imported Amarena cherries.
serverNotes: Delicate multi-layered crêpe cake with pastry cream, berries. Light, elegant, beautiful. Pairs with sparkling wines (Prosecco, Champagne), Moscato d'Asti, or dessert rosé. Sophisticated French-inspired dessert.

name: Mascarpone Cheesecake
description: House made mascarpone cheesecake with an almond-biscotti crust, topped with macerated seasonal berries and fresh lemon curd.
serverNotes: Italian-style cheesecake with mascarpone, almond-biscotti crust, seasonal berries, lemon curd. Creamy, bright, balanced. Pairs wonderfully with Moscato d'Asti, Prosecco, dessert wines, or espresso. Also great with limoncello. Contains nuts.

name: Chocolate Torta *
description: Flourless chocolate torta served with raspberry sauce and fresh raspberries.
serverNotes: Flourless chocolate torte - intense, fudgy, rich. For serious chocolate lovers. Pairs excellently with Port, Banyuls, coffee cocktails, or stout beers. Gluten-free option.

name: Cannoli Duo
description: Traditional vanilla cannoli garnished with chocolate chips and powdered sugar. Can be made GF with GF shells.
serverNotes: Two Italian cannoli with sweet ricotta filling, chocolate chips, pistachios. GF shells available. Classic Sicilian dessert. Pairs with dessert wines (Marsala, Vin Santo), espresso, or sweet liqueurs. Traditional Italian favorite.

name: 3 Scoops House Made Gelati & Sorbetti *
description: Gelato: Vanilla, Chocolate, Strawberry, Peach, Pistachio, Blackberry, Coconut, Salted Caramel, Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip. Sorbetto: Blood Orange, Limoncello.
serverNotes: House-made Italian gelato and sorbetto. Choose 3 scoops of any combination. Gelato is creamier and denser than ice cream. Sorbetto is dairy-free. Note: Chocolate and Pistachio gelato contain peanuts, tree nuts

name: "Michelangelato" Sampler (5 cones)
description: A palette of mini cones made from our housemade Italian gelati and sorbetti. You choose… all one flavor or mix it up and try different flavors.
serverNotes: Fun sampler with 5 mini cones of gelato/sorbetto. Mix and match flavors! Great for sharing or trying multiple flavors. Perfect for kids or indecisive guests. Pairs with espresso or dessert wines. Interactive, playful dessert experience.

name: "Michelangelato" Sampler (10 cones)
description: A palette of mini cones made from our housemade Italian gelati and sorbetti. You choose… all one flavor or mix it up and try different flavors.
serverNotes: Large sampler with 10 mini cones of gelato/sorbetto. Perfect for groups, families, or parties. Mix and match any flavors. Great for sharing and tasting. Pairs with espresso or dessert wines. Fun, shareable dessert for the table.
